formElement.label: Lab Manager Server:
formElement.documentation: Hostname or IP address of the Lab Manager server.

formElement.label: Login as:
formElement.documentation: VMware vCenter Lab Manager account username/password. This account must have enough privileges to perform API funtions.

formElement.label: Attempt Connection?:
formElement.documentation: Attempt a connection to check credentials.

formElement.label: Debug Level:
formElement.documentation: Provide the debug level for the output: 0=errors only, 1=normal headers and responses, 2+=debugging information included.

formElement.label: Soap Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Provide the timeout in seconds for each soap call.
